definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Jessica's musical talents range from singing opera to playing the electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 傑西卡很有音樂天分，從唱歌劇到彈電吉他她都會。

sentences.english: All that talent adds up to zero with a sub-par mental game.
sentences.chinese: 所有的天分在心理競技中累加爲零。

sentences.english: If you have a talent, it’s life’s gift to you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一種天分，那是生命賜予你的禮物。

sentences.english: Talented as he is, he is not yet ready to turn professional.
sentences.chinese: 天分，他還沒把心用到專業上去。

sentences.english: I know he is good. I know he has such talent.
sentences.chinese: 我知道他情況很好，我也知道他有這個天分。

sentences.english: Deng’s wise leadership unchained China’s enormous talents and energy.
sentences.chinese: 鄧的領導解放了中國的發展的天分和能量。

sentences.english: Talent, skill and luck play a part, but there is more.
sentences.chinese: 天分，技能和運氣起一部分作用，但還有更多。

sentences.english: This supports athletically talented, but financially poor children.
sentences.chinese: 這個基金會資助有天分但是貧窮的孩子。

sentences.english: He has a genius for epigram.
A: I think he’s very talented.
And you, godson , you now, you just don't have talent enough.
sentences.chinese: 那麼你，教子，你現在，你就沒有足夠的天分。

sentences.english: Figured out all the maths and cut a piece of buckram the right size.
sentences.chinese: 發揮一下數學天分吧，裁一條大小合適的紙帶來。

sentences.english: Every single person is different and we all have some sort of unique talent.
sentences.chinese: 每一個人都是不同的，我們都具有某種獨特的天分。

sentences.english: Hong Chengli of recreational industry parvenu discovered her artistic talent.
sentences.chinese: 娛樂業新貴洪承禮發現了她的藝術天分。

sentences.english: Though they are twin brothers, their aptitudes are not quite the same.
sentences.chinese: 他們雖然是孿生兄弟，但彼此的學習天分殊不一樣。

sentences.english: Untalented sports team often resort to dirty tricks to win .
sentences.chinese: 沒有天分的運動隊伍常常用不當手法來贏取比賽。

definition: training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
level of mastery (of a skill or area of knowledge)/(archaic) to pay a visit to sb
